In our class project, we wanted to see if we could tell who’s really the expert in a topic versus just ChatGPT. Let’s see how easy it is to figure out who the real expert is!

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: I wanted to use Chat GBT to not only come up with some solutions, but be a leader in fighting for a solution.
text: I wanted to use Chat GBT to not only come up with some solutions, but be a leader in fighting for a solution.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
Conversation with Chat GBT.
First, I informed Chat GBT about my topic, then asked how one can make a difference.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
In Chat GBT’s words…

Advocate for Policy Change: Push for local and state policies that encourage the adoption of renewable energy and energy-efficient practices. These policies can include renewable energy mandates, tax incentives, and emissions regulations, all of which can accelerate the transition away from fossil fuels.
Support Community Initiatives: Get involved in or back community-driven projects focused on renewable energy adoption and energy efficiency. Supporting initiatives such as community solar projects or local energy co-ops fosters grassroots efforts towards cleaner energy solutions.
Reduce Energy Consumption: Take steps to decrease personal energy usage by implementing energy-efficient measures in homes and businesses. Simple actions like using energy-efficient appliances, improving insulation, and being mindful of energy consumption habits can contribute to overall energy savings.
Invest in Renewable Energy: Consider investing in renewable energy options like rooftop solar panels or community renewable energy projects. By financially supporting renewable energy initiatives, individuals can help drive demand for clean energy alternatives and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.
Advocate for Utility Reform: Push for reforms within the utility sector to increase transparency and accountability while prioritizing clean energy. Advocating for policies that promote competition in the energy market, consumer choice, and environmental responsibility can influence utility practices towards cleaner energy sources.
Engage with PECO: Directly engage with PECO through public forums, stakeholder meetings, or advocacy campaigns to voice concerns and demand action towards cleaner energy solutions. By amplifying community voices and exerting pressure on the utility, individuals can influence corporate decision-making and push for a transition to clean energy.
Educate and Raise Awareness: Spread awareness about the benefits of transitioning to clean energy and the impacts of fossil fuel dependence on the environment and public health. Educating others about the importance of clean energy solutions can mobilize support and generate momentum for change within the community.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: Then, I wanted to know if Chat GBT could have a say in this.
text:
Then, I wanted to know if Chat GBT could have a say in this.

I asked Chat GBT if there was a way it can guide this.
“Can you, as chat gbt, guide this revolution? Share your thoughts, get people interested. Can AI be used to guide community dilemmas?”

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
Chat GBT replied…

As an AI, I can provide information, guidance, and support to help facilitate discussions and actions around community issues, including energy transitions and environmental advocacy. While I can’t independently lead a revolution or directly participate in human-led movements, I can certainly assist in the following ways:
Providing Information: I can offer factual information about renewable energy technologies, climate change, environmental impacts, and policy options to help people understand the issues at hand.
Offering Perspectives: I can provide diverse perspectives on complex topics, helping to broaden understanding and encourage critical thinking about potential solutions.
Facilitating Discussions: I can facilitate discussions by posing questions, prompting exploration of different viewpoints, and encouraging constructive dialogue among community members.
Analyzing Data: I can analyze data related to energy usage, emissions, and environmental impacts to help inform decision-making and advocacy efforts.
Offering Ideas: I can suggest potential strategies, tactics, and actions that communities can take to address energy-related challenges and promote sustainable practices.
Engaging and Inspiring: Through conversation and interaction, I can engage with individuals and inspire them to take action, whether it’s through advocacy, behavior change, or community organizing.
Educating and Raising Awareness: I can help educate people about the importance of clean energy and environmental stewardship, raising awareness and mobilizing support for positive change.
While AI can play a supportive role in guiding community dilemmas, it’s essential to recognize that meaningful change ultimately depends on the collective actions and decisions of individuals and communities. AI can complement human efforts by providing information, insights, and tools to empower people to drive positive change in their communities.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: This is predictably not what I wanted. I want Chat GBT to be a thought leader. I want Chat GBT to be able to guide us in solving this problem besides giving generic answers.
text:
This is predictably not what I wanted. I want Chat GBT to be a thought leader. I want Chat GBT to be able to guide us in solving this problem besides giving generic answers.

I asked Chat GBT to be a thought leader, and put her input to this issue. Here’s what I found…


As an AI, I can certainly strive to provide more focused and impactful guidance on addressing the challenge of energy usage and environmental impact in Philadelphia. Here’s how I might approach it:

Lead by Example: AI systems can demonstrate commitment by adopting energy-efficient practices and supporting clean energy initiatives.
Data-Driven Strategies: Utilize AI to analyze data on energy usage, emissions, and community needs, enabling targeted solutions and tracking progress effectively.
Empower Community Engagement: Create AI-driven platforms for inclusive dialogue and collaborative problem-solving, amplifying community voices in decision-making.
Advocate for Policy Change: Use AI to inform policymakers with data-driven insights, advocating for policies that incentivize renewable energy adoption and address systemic barriers.
Foster Innovation and Collaboration: Facilitate partnerships between stakeholders and leverage AI to drive innovation in clean energy technologies and practices.
Raise Awareness and Mobilize Support: Employ AI-driven communication tools to raise awareness, highlight success stories, and inspire collective action towards sustainability.
By implementing these streamlined strategies, AI can effectively guide efforts to address energy usage and environmental impact in Philadelphia, fostering a cleaner and more sustainable future.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: Now, I wanted to see what types of images the LLM would come up with picturing AI/Chat GBT
text:
Now, I wanted to see what types of images the LLM would come up with picturing AI/Chat GBT


This one was too generic and didn’t make much sense.



I love this one. This makes me have high hopes for Artificial Intelligence.

title: Life in ’84 (not 1984)
section: Art. How will AI change the world of art? Here, I prompted it to show me how creativity, art, and the world will be in 2084. Pretty scary, right? The power Artificial Intelligence will hold seems to be vast.
text:
Art. How will AI change the world of art? Here, I prompted it to show me how creativity, art, and the world will be in 2084. Pretty scary, right? The power Artificial Intelligence will hold seems to be vast.
HERE’S WHAT CHAT GBT PREDICTED ART WILL BE LIKE IN 2084.


Virtual Reality (VR) Dominance: By 2084, virtual reality has become the dominant medium for artistic expression. Artists create immersive experiences that transcend traditional boundaries of space and time, allowing viewers to step into and interact with art in unprecedented ways.
AI-Generated Art: Artificial intelligence plays a significant role in art creation, with AI algorithms generating original artworks or collaborating with human artists to push the boundaries of creativity. This blurs the distinction between man-made and machine-made art.
Augmented Reality (AR) Street Art: Public spaces are transformed by augmented reality street art, where digital artworks overlay physical environments, offering dynamic and interactive experiences to passersby.
Environmental Art: With increasing awareness of environmental issues, artists use their work to raise awareness about climate change, biodiversity loss, and sustainability. Installations and sculptures made from recycled materials are commonplace.
Bioart and Genetic Engineering: Artists explore the intersection of art and biology, creating living sculptures and installations using genetically modified organisms. Bioart raises ethical questions about the manipulation of life for artistic purposes.



Here, I prompted the LLM to create an image of a world where Artificial Intelligence is in more power.



Here, I prompted a scarier image, where robots take over.



Here, I prompted the LLM to show what it would be like in 2084 where Artificial Intelligence takes over, and humans submit. A world where humans are controlled.

title: Life in ’84 (not 1984)
section: Power. In these images, I prompted power dynamics, and how robots and humans will interact in 2084. I asked “How will power dynamics change in the year 2084 in regards to artificial intelligence? will privacy change? will robots hold power over humans? will humans remain in power?”
text:
Power. In these images, I prompted power dynamics, and how robots and humans will interact in 2084. I asked “How will power dynamics change in the year 2084 in regards to artificial intelligence? will privacy change? will robots hold power over humans? will humans remain in power?”
HERE’S HOW CHAT GBT PREDICTED POWER DYNAMICS IN 2084.


Shifts in Economic Power: AI and automation are likely to continue transforming industries, leading to changes in the distribution of wealth and economic power. Jobs may be disrupted or replaced by automation, potentially leading to socioeconomic disparities unless measures are taken to ensure equitable distribution of resources and opportunities.
Dependency on AI: As AI systems become more integrated into various aspects of daily life, there may be a growing dependency on these technologies. This could give those who control AI systems significant influence and power over others, especially if AI systems are involved in critical infrastructure or decision-making processes.
Privacy Concerns: The widespread use of AI-powered surveillance systems, data analytics, and smart devices may raise significant privacy concerns. Governments, corporations, and other entities may have unprecedented access to personal data, raising questions about surveillance, data security, and individual autonomy.
Ethical and Regulatory Frameworks: There will likely be ongoing debates and efforts to establish ethical guidelines and regulatory frameworks for AI development and deployment. This includes considerations of fairness, transparency, accountability, and the potential impacts of AI on society.
Human-Robot Interaction: While AI and robotics may become increasingly sophisticated, it’s unlikely that robots will hold power over humans in the traditional sense. However, there may be complex interactions between humans and AI-powered systems, including issues of autonomy, agency, and control.

title: About
text: Here are examples of LLMs as communicators

title: The Future of Chicago
text:
I am very fond of Chicago. I grew up in the city and spent my first two years at Loyola Chicago. I often wonder what my favorite city will look like decades from now, especially the years after I’m gone. What if I used Chat GBT and AI-Generated images to predict the future of my hometown, Chicago, IL?



Here’s a speculative glimpse into how the infrastructure, lakefront, buildings, skyline, and landscape of a city might evolve over the next century:
20 years:
The city’s skyline continues to grow vertically as new skyscrapers emerge, reflecting ongoing urbanization and economic growth. Infrastructure improvements focus on sustainability and resilience, with investments in renewable energy, efficient public transportation, and climate adaptation measures. The lakefront undergoes revitalization efforts, with enhanced public spaces, recreational amenities, and green infrastructure projects to mitigate the effects of climate change and protect against rising water levels. 40 years:
Advances in architecture and construction technology lead to the development of innovative, eco-friendly buildings that blend seamlessly with the surrounding landscape. The skyline evolves into a mix of futuristic skyscrapers and historic landmarks, preserving the city’s heritage while embracing modernity. Infrastructure upgrades prioritize smart city initiatives, with interconnected systems for transportation, energy, and communication enhancing efficiency and sustainability. 60 years:
The cityscape undergoes a transformation as urban planning initiatives prioritize green spaces, pedestrian-friendly neighborhoods, and mixed-use developments. Sustainable infrastructure becomes the norm, with renewable energy sources powering the city and green building practices reducing environmental impact. The lakefront becomes a focal point for recreation, culture, and community engagement, with vibrant waterfront districts and resilient infrastructure protecting against natural disasters. 80 years:
The skyline reaches new heights as super-tall skyscrapers redefine the city’s silhouette, symbolizing its status as a global hub for innovation and commerce. Urban design principles prioritize inclusivity and accessibility, with equitable access to resources and amenities shaping the built environment. The lakefront remains a cherished asset, with ongoing efforts to preserve biodiversity, enhance water quality, and promote sustainable development along the waterfront. 100+ years:
The city’s infrastructure reflects a legacy of sustainable planning and stewardship, with resilient systems capable of adapting to evolving environmental challenges. Architecture blends seamlessly with nature, with buildings designed to harmonize with the surrounding landscape and minimize ecological footprint. The lakefront remains a beloved destination for residents and visitors alike, serving as a model of sustainable waterfront development and environmental stewardship for generations to come. While these scenarios are speculative, they illustrate potential trajectories for the evolution of a city’s infrastructure, skyline, and landscape over the next century. The actual outcome will depend on a myriad of factors, including technological advancements, policy decisions, and societal priorities.


This was very optimistic, I wonder when/if Chat GBT thinks Chicago will eventually collapse. Here’s what it said…

Economic Resilience: Chicago has a diverse economy with strengths in finance, manufacturing, healthcare, and technology. However, if the city fails to adapt to shifts in global markets, technological advancements, or economic downturns, it could face challenges such as job losses, business closures, and declining tax revenue.
Infrastructure Strain: Aging infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and public transportation systems, poses a significant risk to the city’s functionality. Without adequate investment in maintenance and upgrades, Chicago could experience increased congestion, service disruptions, and decreased quality of life for residents.
Social Inequality: Economic disparities and social inequities persist in Chicago, affecting access to education, healthcare, housing, and employment opportunities. Failure to address these issues could lead to social unrest, crime, and further polarization within the city.
Environmental Hazards: Chicago is susceptible to environmental hazards such as extreme weather events, flooding, and pollution. Failure to mitigate and adapt to these risks could result in property damage, public health crises, and displacement of vulnerable communities.
Political Dysfunction: Political gridlock, corruption, and lack of effective governance can hinder the city’s ability to address pressing issues and implement long-term solutions. Without strong leadership and collaboration, Chicago may struggle to overcome its challenges and maintain public trust.
While these scenarios outline potential risks, it’s important to note that cities are resilient and have a capacity for innovation and adaptation. With proactive planning, investment, and community engagement, Chicago has the potential to overcome its challenges and thrive in the face of adversity.


That’s less than ideal. What does an AI generated image have to say? Here’s what I found the LLM to predict, giving no cues to bias on whether Chicago will collapse or thrive in the coming decades.



50 years. Chicago seems to be thriving.

title: My Nail Salon
text: Pictured is the name, tables, employees, and customers. There is an emphasis on nature and green to give the illusion of being in nature while getting your nails done. A calming experience.
